query: Which campaign and ad group had maximum female impressions on 29 dec 2024?
sql:
SELECT gcd.campaign_name, gag.ad_group_name, SUM(ggp.metrics_impressions) AS total_impressions
FROM advida-data-pipeline.manager_dataset_preprod_updated.google_ads_gender_performance_2643649617 ggp
JOIN advida-data-pipeline.manager_dataset_preprod_updated.google_ads_ad_group_details_2643649617 gag ON ggp.ad_group_id = gag.ad_group_id
JOIN advida-data-pipeline.manager_dataset_preprod_updated.google_ads_campaign_details_2643649617 gcd ON gag.campaign_id = gcd.campaign_id
WHERE ggp.customer_id = 3424742100
AND ggp.ad_group_criterion_gender_type = 'FEMALE'
AND ggp.segments_date = '2024-12-29'
GROUP BY gcd.campaign_name, gag.ad_group_name
ORDER BY total_impressions DESC
LIMIT 1
instructions:
## DEMOGRAPHICS ANALYSIS :
    - Refer the below mentioned database tables when the user asks about demographics related information:
        - Age Range specific performance information = google_ads_age_range_performance_2643649617
        - Gender specific performance information = google_ads_gender_performance_2643649617
        - Income specific performance information = google_ads_income_range_performance_2643649617
        - Parental Status specific performance information = google_ads_parental_status_performance_2643649617
    - When the user asks about demographic related information, create 4 different sql queries specific to the above mentioned 4 database tables as per user requirements
